name: Broderick Worr
text:
Army units that retreat from this planet are destroyed instead.
Each other [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit you control at a [Stronghold] planet (green) gets +1 ATK and gains, "Cannot retreat or be routed."
flavor: "I will restore the sanctity of this world, no matter the cost."

name: Anxious Infantry Platoon
text: [FORCED REACTION]: After a combat round at this planet ends, you may pay 1 [RESOURCE]. If you do not, retreat this unit.
flavor: "When did I say you can run? Get back to dying you cowards!" -Broderick Worr

name: Forward Barracks
text: [REACTION]: After a combat round ends, if you control an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit at the planet where the battle is taking place, put 1 Guardsman token into play at that planet.

name: Summary Execution
text:
Play only during a battle.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Sacrifice a unit at a planet with your warlord to have that planet gain a [Stronghold] icon (green) until the end of the battle. Then, draw 1 card.

name: Commissarial Bolt Pistol
text:
Attach to a Commissar unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK.
[REACTION]: After an army unit you control at this planet leaves play, deal 1 damage to a target army unit at this planet.

name: Commander Starblaze
text:
You may include common [ASTRA MILITARUM] cards in your deck, but cannot include other cards from a non-[TAU] faction.
[REACTION]: After this warlord commits to a planet, move 1 [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit you control from an adjacent planet to this planet.
flavor: "We fight now not to claim this world, but to save it."

name: Ardent Auxiliaries
text: [REACTION]: After this unit commits to a planet, if you control an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit at this planet, ready this unit.
flavor: Tau Auxiliaries often fight alongside different alien races and have learned to use their allies strengths to be more effective in battle.

name: Starblaze's Outpost
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support and return an [ASTRA MILITARUM] army unit at a planet to your hand to put a [TAU] unit with equal or lower printed cost into play from your hand at the same planet.

name: Bond of Brotherhood
text: [ACTION]: Until the end of the phase, each [TAU] unit you control at a target planet gets +2 HP and each [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit you control at the targeted planet gets +2 ATK.

name: Searing Burst Cannon
text:
Attach to a unit.
[INTERRUPT]: When attached unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, if no shield card was used during this attack, double the damage taken.

name: Lone Wolf
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this unit to move it to a target planet with an enemy warlord and without any unit you control.
flavor: The lone survivor of this wolf pack, he has nothing left but a thirst for revenge.

name: Righteous Initiate
text: [UNSTOPPABLE] - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and this unit gets +2 ATK until the end of the phase.

name: Accept Any Challenge
text: [REACTION]: After you win a battle at a [Tech] planet (blue), draw 1 card for each Black Templars unit you control at that planet. (Max 1 per round.)

name: Rickety Warbuggy
text: [GOES FASTA!] - While your opponent has the initiative, this unit cannot be dealt damage by units while you control an army unit at this planet not named "Rickety Warbuggy".

name: Lucky Warpaint
text:
Attach to an [ORK] unit.
Attached unit gains the Blue trait.
Attached unit gains Immune to enemy events.

name: Ravening Psychopath
text: [REACTION]: After this unit resolves an attack, deal 1 damage to this unit to deal 1 damage to an enemy army unit at the same planet.

name: Sowing Chaos
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Destroy each army unit with printed cost 2 or lower at each [tech] planet (blue).
flavor: From the corpse of the Kaerux Erameas an army of daemonic force erupted, ready to slaughter all in their path.

name: Stalking Ur-Ghul
text: This unit gets -5 ATK while attacking a warlord or undamaged army unit.

name: Holding Cell
text:
Your opponent cannot deploy copies of the attached card.
[REACTION]: After an enemy army unit is destroyed by an attack, if no card is attached to this support, attach that unit to this support.

name: Prophetic Farseer
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit, look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck. Discard any number of those cards with 1 or more shield icons and place the remaining cards on top of his deck in any order.

name: Wraithguard Revenant
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you win a command struggle at a [Stronghold] planet (green), put this unit into play from your discard pile or hand at that planet instead of taking the planet's card and resource bonuses.

name: Deathly Web Shrine
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: After you move a unit you control from one planet to another, exhaust this support to exhaust a non-Elite army unit at the same planet as the unit just moved.

name: Striking Ravener
text: [REACTION]: After this unit destroys an army unit by an attack, ready this unit.
flavor: A Ravener is a dangerous predator that is known to ambush its prey from beneath the ground, bursting forth in an eruption of earth and deadly talons.

name: Acid Maw
text:
Attach to an army unit you control.
Damage dealt by attached unit cannot be prevented.

name: Ba'ar Zul the Hate-Bound
text: [REACTION]: After a unit you control at this planet takes damage, move all of that damage to this warlord.

name: Ba'ar Zul the Hate-Bound
flavor: "Your shrines will burn, your streets will run with blood, your false idols shattered, your people slaughtered by the thousands, your very planet torn apart... and the barest fraction of my hatred will be satisfied."

name: Ba'ar Zul's Cleavers
text: [ACTION]: Deal 2 damage to this unit to have it get +2 ATK for its next attack this phase. (Limit once per phase)

name: Kaerux Erameas
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this support to resolve a battle at a non-first planet without a warlord. Use this ability only if no battle has been initiated this phase.

name: Blood For The Blood God!
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Deal 1 damage to each undamaged unit at a target planet.
flavor: Skulls for the Skull Throne!

name: The Butcher's Nails
text:
Attach to your warlord.
Attached unit gains Brutal while it is hale.
Attached unit gains Armorbane while it is bloodied.

name: Archon Salaine Morn
text: [REACTION]: After a Kabalite or Raider unit enters play under your control at a [Material] planet (red), gain 1 [RESOURCE]. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "I would rather kill on my feet, than die on my knees."

name: Shadowed Thorns Pillagers
flavor: "Revenge is delicious, but it is best when seasoned with ambition." -Archon Salaine Morn

name: The Nexus of Shadows
text: [ACTION]: Pay 2 [RESOURCE] to draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: The Nexus of Shadows serves as both a trading hub and a base from which to launch deadly raids.

name: Inevitable Betrayal
text: [ACTION]: Choose any number of undamaged enemy army units at a target planet. Until the end of the phase, treat each of those units as if its printed text box were blank.

name: Last Breath
text:
Attach to a unique unit.
[REACTION]: After attached unit damages an army unit by attack, the attacked unit gets -3 ATK until the end of the phase.

name: Neophyte Apprentice
text: [FORCED REACTION]: After this unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, sacrifice it to search the top 6 cards of your deck for a Black Templars unit with cost 4 or lower. Put that unit into play at this planet, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

name: The Black Sword
text:
Attach to a Black Templars army unit.
[REACTION]: After attached unit is declared as a defender, deal 2 damage to the attacker.

name: Sacaellum Shrine Guard
text: While this unit is at a [Stronghold] planet (green) it gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.
flavor: The guardians of the Shrine of Saint Camila were the first to join the fight to protect their home from the armies of Ba'ar Zul.

name: Troop Transport
text: [ACTION]: Sacrifice this support to either put a Guardsman token into play at a planet, or put 2 Guardsman tokens into play at a [Stronghold] planet (green).

name: Front Line 'Ard Boyz
text: This unit must be declared as a defender, if able.
flavor: All the scrap metal strewn across the surface of Sacaellum provided plenty of new material for the 'Ard Boyz among Gorzod's horde.

name: Ramshackle Trukk
text: [GOES FASTA!] - While your opponent has the initiative, this unit gets +4 HP.
flavor: Ork Meks focus on making their Trukks as killy as possible, ignoring trivial things like making sure they don't fall apart.

name: Rok Bombardment
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Target a planet where a battle is taking place. Until the end of the battle, after each unit at the targeted planet resolves an attack, deal 1 damage to it. If the targeted planet is a [Material] planet (red), this effect only deals damage to enemy units instead.

name: Dire Avenger Exarch
text: A Warrior unit you control at this planet must be declared as a defender, if able.

name: Mind War
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust a target non-Elite army unit at a planet with a Psyker army unit you control.
flavor: The immense power of an Eldar Psyker's mind can be used to crush those of lesser beings, rendering them helpless in the heat of battle.

name: Prudent Fire Warriors
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit leaves play, attach each attachment on it to a target eligible unit at this planet.

name: Exploratory Drone
text: [REACTION]: After a non-[TAU] unit is deployed at this planet, move this unit to an adjacent planet.

name: Auxiliary Armor
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +1 HP.
If attached unit is a non-[TAU] unit, it gains 1 command icon.

name: Soaring Gargoyles
text: [HIVE MIND] - Each Termagant token you control at this planet gains Flying.

name: Sacaellum Infestors
text: [REACTION]: After a planet is infested, exhaust this support to take either the card bonus or the resource bonus of that planet.

name: Gorzod
text:
You may include common Vehicle units from both the [ASTRA MILITARUM] and [SPACE MARINE] factions, but cannot include other cards from a non-[ORK] faction.
[INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an [ASTRA MILITARUM] or [SPACE MARINE] unit, reduce its cost by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Gorzod's Wagons
text: [GOES FASTA!] - While your opponent has the initiative, this unit gets +2 ATK.

name: Kustomisation Station
text:
Each Vehicle unit you control loses all faction affiliations and gains the [ORK] faction affiliation.
[ORK] Vehicle units you control get +1 ATK and +1 HP.

name: Hostile Acquisition
text: [REACTION]: After your warlord damages a Vehicle army unit by an attack, gain control of that unit.

name: The Bloodrunna
text:
Attach to your warlord.
Attached unit gets +2 HP and gains "Reaction: After a Vehicle unit is destroyed at this planet, ready this unit. (Limit once per phase.)"

name: Imperial Fists Devastators
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit to a [tech] planet (blue), destroy a target Location support card.

name: Teleportarium
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to move a [SPACE MARINE] army unit you control with printed cost 3 or lower from a [Tech] planet (blue) to an adjacent planet.

name: Death Korps Engineers
text: [ACTION]: Sacrifice this unit to destroy a target exhausted support card.
flavor: They will ensure the destruction of their target, even at the cost of their lives.

name: Vanguard Soldiers
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit leaves play, ready another target army unit you control.

name: Inspirational Fervor
text: [REACTION]: After you win a battle at a [Stronghold] planet (green), move up to 2 non-warlord units you control at that planet to a target planet.

name: Prodigal Sons Disciple
text: [REACTION]: After this unit resolves an attack against an enemy army unit, deal X unpreventable damage to a target enemy unit at this planet. X is the number of command icons the targeted unit has.

name: Seer of Deceit
text: While this unit is at a [tech] planet (blue), it gains: +1 [CARD] when command struggle won at this planet.

name: Khornate Chain Axe
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +2 ATK.
[BLOODTHIRST] - During a round in which 1 or more units have been destroyed at this planet, attached unit gains Brutal.

name: Mandrake Fearmonger
text: [REACTION]: After this unit damages an army unit by an attack, discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand.

name: Shadowed Thorns Bodysuit
text:
Attach to a Kabalite army unit.
[REACTION]: After attached unit is declared as a defender, exhaust this attachment to cancel the remainder of the attack.

name: Fire Prism
text: [REACTION]: After this unit damages an army unit by an attack, exhaust a target enemy army unit at this planet.

name: Saim-Hann Jetbike
text:
Attach to an army unit you control.
Limit 1 per unit.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this attachment to move attached unit to a planet with a type shared with this planet. Then, deal 1 damage to an army unit at this planet.

name: Prototype Crisis Suit
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit, search the top 9 cards of your deck for up to 2 [TAU] attachments, each with printed cost 2 or lower. Put each eligible attachment into play attached to this unit. Then, shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

name: Mont'ka Strike
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust each ready Soldier unit you control at a target planet to deal damage equal to their combined printed ATK value to an enemy army unit at the targeted planet.

name: Sae'lum Enclave
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy a non-[TAU] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 2.

name: Genestealer Prowler
flavor: The Genestealers that crawled from the ruins of the Space Hulk found refuge in the cracks and hidden places of Sacaellum. Lurking in the dark and preying on the wounded while growing their numbers.

name: Biomass Sacrifice
text: [ACTION]: Discard 1 or more unit cards from your hand to gain [RESOURCE] equal to the number of cards discarded by this effect.

name: "Subject: Ω-X62113"
text: Each Genestealer card in your hand may be deployed to infested planets as if it had ambush.

name: Invasive Genestealers
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit, target an enemy army unit at this planet. Until the end of the phase, the targeted unit gets -1 HP and this unit gets +1 HP.

name: Ruined Passages
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust and sacrifice this support to ready each Genestealer unit you control at a target planet.
flavor: The endless halls of the Kaerux Erameas were home to hidden terrors, lurking in the depths of the ship.

name: Gene Implantation
text: [REACTION]: After a Genestealer unit you control destroys an enemy unit with printed cost 3 or lower by an attack, put that unit into play from your opponent's discard pile under your control at the same planet.

name: Lethal Toxin Sacs
text:
You may deploy this attachment from your discard pile.
Attach to an army unit you control.
Attached unit gets +3 ATK and -1 HP.

name: Sword Brethren Dreadnought
text: [UNSTOPPABLE] - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and you may trigger the Battle ability of this planet.

name: Declare the Crusade
text: [REACTION]: After you win a battle at a [tech] planet (blue), choose another planet in play and a planet that has been removed from the game. Switch the chosen planets.

name: Cenobyte Servitor
text:
Attach to a Black Templars unit.
Attached unit gets +1 HP.
[ACTION]: Sacrifice this attachment to put a Relic attachment into play from your hand attached to an eligible unit.

name: Taurox APC
text: [REACTION]: After a combat round at a [Stronghold] planet (green) ends, move this unit to that planet.

name: M35 Galaxy Lasgun
text:
Attach to a non-warlord unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.
[INTERRUPT]: When attached unit leaves play, return this attachment to your hand.

name: Skrap Nabba
text: While this unit is at a [Material] planet (red), it gains: +2 [RESOURCE] when command struggle won at this planet.

name: Outflank'em
text: [REACTION]: After your combat turn ends, take a combat turn.
flavor: "C'mon boyz! Krump 'em once for Gork and krump 'em aginn for Mork!" -Gorzod

name: Smasha Gun Battery
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Exhaust this support to have each player deal an amount of damage equal to the number of cards in his hand among units he controls.

name: Master Warpsmith
text: [REACTION]: After you sacrifice a Cultist token, reduce the cost of the next Elite unit you deploy this phase by 1.
flavor: Warpsmiths use soul forges to craft monstrosities for the armies of Chaos.

name: Corrupted Teleportarium
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to move an Elite unit you control from a [tech] planet (blue) to another planet.

name: Dying Sun Marauder
text: [REACTION]: After you gain 1 or more [RESOURCE], ready this unit.
flavor: The Kabalits of the Dying Sun delight in watching the last rays of hope fade from their opponent's eyes.

name: Kabalite Harriers
text: [REACTION]: After a Kabalite unit enters play at this planet, deal 1 damage to a target undamaged unit at this planet.

name: Gut and Pillage
text: [REACTION]: After you win a battle at a [Material] planet (red), gain 3 [RESOURCE]. (Max 1 per round.)
flavor: "Take everything we can use. Kill everything we can't." -Archon Salaine Morn

name: Wildrider Vyper
text: [REACTION]: After another unit moves from this planet to another planet, move this unit to that planet.

name: Bonesinger Choir
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an [ELDAR] Vehicle or [ELDAR] Drone unit, exhaust this support to reduce its cost by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Auxiliary Overseer
text: For each non-[TAU] unit you conrol at this planet, this unit gets +1 ATK.

name: Drone Defense System
text:
Attach to a Pilot or Vehicle unit.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust attached unit to deal 2 damage to each exhausted enemy unit at this planet.

name: Chaplain Mavros
text: [ACTION]: Deal 1 damage to a target [SPACE MARINE] unit you control at a [tech] planet (blue). The targeted unit gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)
flavor: "We are the burning flame that shines in this world's darkest hour."

name: Reclusiam Templars
text: [UNSTOPPABLE] - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and ready this unit.
flavor: Mavros's soldiers are devoted to protecting the sacred relics of the Imperium at any cost.

name: The Emperor's Champion
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: A target ready enemy army unit at this planet must be declared as an attacker and this unit declared as a defender during your opponent's next combat turn, if able. (Limit once per combat phase.)

name: Faith and Hatred
text: [REACTION]: After a unit you control is assigned damage by an attack, exhaust this support to prevent 1 of that damage.
flavor: "No Pity! No Remorse! No Fear!" - Black Templars' Battle Cry

name: Vow of Honor
text: [REACTION]: After a [SPACE MARINE] unit you control takes damage, that unit gets +3 ATK for its next attack this phase.

name: Ancient Crozius Arcanum
text:
Attach to a unit you control.
Attached unit gains, "Unstoppable - The first time this unit is assigned damage this round, prevent 1 of that damage and remove 1 damage from this unit."

name: Sacaellum's Finest
text: [REACTION]: After you win a battle at a non-first [Stronghold] planet (green), instead of triggering the planet's Battle ability, put this unit into play from your hand at a [Stronghold] planet (green).

name: Cathedral of Saint Camila
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this support to target up to 1 non-Elite enemy army unit at each [Stronghold] planet (green). Exhaust each targeted unit. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: A great shrine of worship built in honor of Lord General Camila, leader of the first crusade into the Traxis Sector

name: Salvaged Battlewagon
text: [REACTION]: After this unit destroys an enemy unit by an attack, put an [ORK] unit with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand at an adjacent planet.

name: Huge Chain-Choppa
text:
Attach to a non-warlord unit.
Attached unit gets +4 ATK.
Attached unit cannot ready between combat rounds during the combat phase.

name: Berzerker Warriors
text: [INTERRUPT]: When an enemy unit is destroyed, deploy this unit from your hand at the same planet as the destroyed unit.

name: Killing Field
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to have each unit at a target planet lose Ranged until the end of the phase.
flavor: On the bloodied fields of Sacaellum, none could escape the ravages of war.

name: Staff of Change
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Limit 1 per unit.
[REACTION]: After you win a command struggle at this planet, deal 2 damage to a target unit at this planet.

name: Shadowed Thorns Venom
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit, you may move each Kabalite army unit you control to a [Material] planet (red). (Each unit can move to a different planet).

name: Rapid Assault
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Target a planet. Put a Kabalite unit with a printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand exhausted at the targeted planet. Then, if the targeted planet is a [Material] planet (red), ready up to 2 Kabalite units at that planet.

name: Saim-Hann Kinsman
text: While this unit is at a [Stronghold] planet (green) it gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.
flavor: Born into the ruling elite of their family, Kinsman fight fiercely to defend their Craftworld.

name: Eldritch Storm
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Target up to 1 enemy unit at each [Stronghold] planet (green). Deal 2 damage to each targeted unit.
flavor: A vortex of psychic power filled the sky and left nothing but ashes in its wake.

name: Shuriken Catapult
text:
Attach to a Warrior army unit.
Attached unit gets +3 ATK.

name: Sae'lum Pioneer
text: While this unit is at a [Material] planet (red), it gains: +2 [RESOURCE] when command struggle won at this planet.

name: Colony Shield Generator
text: [INTERRUPT]: When a support card you control would be targeted, exhaust this support to have this card be targeted instead (ignoring targeting restrictions).

name: Devourer Venomthrope
text: [REACTION]: After you win a command struggle at an infested planet, exhaust a target non-Elite army unit at this planet.

name: Genestealer Brood
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit, search the top 6 cards of your deck for a Genestealer card. Reveal it, add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Sudden Adaptation
text: [ACTION]: Return a [TYRANID] army unit at a planet to your hand to put a [TYRANID] army unit with equal or lower printed cost and a different name into play from your hand at the same planet.

name: Talyesin Fharenal
text:
Each unit you control at this planet with the Psyker or Warrior trait gets +1 HP.
While you control a Psyker unit and a Warrior unit at this planet, each unit you control at this planet with the Psyker or Warrior trait gets +1 ATK.
flavor: "There is still time to change the course of history."

name: Talyesin's Spiders
text: [REACTION]: After a Psyker unit you control is declared as an attacked, move this unit to the same planet as that unit.
flavor: A furious assault...

name: Talyesin's Warlocks
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Discard a Warrior card from your hand to ready this unit. (Limit once per combat round.)
flavor: ...to defend their future.

name: Wisdom of the Serpent
text: [HEADQUARTERS ACTION]: Exhaust this support to choose Psyker or Warrior. Then, search the top 3 cards of your deck for a unit with the chosen Trait. Reveal it, add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Path of the Leader
text: [ACTION]: Either (choose one): gain 1 [RESOURCE], have a Warrior unit you control get +1 ATK until the end of the phase, or exhaust a Psyker unit you control to move from one planet to another.

name: Autarch Powersword
text:
Attach to a unit you control.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.
If attached unit is an army unit, it gains the Warrior and Psyker traits.

name: Reliquary Techmarine
text: While this unit is at a [tech] planet (blue), it gains: +1 [CARD] when command struggle won at this planet.

name: Crypt of Saint Camila
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Exhaust this support to put a non-Elite [SPACE MARINE] unit into play from your hand at a [tech] planet (blue). (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: The resting place of Lord General Camila inspires those faithful to the Emperor to fight on, even when all hope seems lost.

name: Leman Russ Conqueror
text: [REACTION]: After this unit resolves an attack, it gets +3 ATK until the end of the phase.

name: Bolster the Defense
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Put a support card into play from your hand with printed cost equal to or lower than the highest number of army unit you control at a planet.

name: Imperial Rally Point
text:
Attach to a [Stronghold] planet (green).
Reduce the cost of each [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit you deploy at this planet by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
flavor: "We stop them here! Let nothing escape your fury!" -Commissar Broderick Worr

name: Corpulent Ork
text: While a battle is being resolved at a planet where you are the only player to control a unit named "Corpulent Ork", your opponent is considered to have the initiative for the purposes of card abilities. (Initiative for determining combat turn order does not change.)

name: Painboy Tent
text: Each damaged [ORK] army unit you control gains 1 command icon.
flavor: A proper Painboy tent gets wounded Orks back to the fight in no time, and with most of their original parts.

name: Frenzied Bloodthirster
text:
Immune to Power events.
[BLOODTHIRST] - During a combat round in which 1 or more units have been destroyed at this planet, this unit gains Armorbane, Brutal, and Flying.

name: Warp Rift
text: [HEADQUARTERS ACTION]: Switch a target planet with an adjacent planet. (Units that were at a switched-out planet are now at the switched-in planet.)

name: Flayed Skull Slaver
text: While this unit is at a [Material] planet (red), it gains: +2 [RESOURCE] when command struggle won at this planet.

name: Raiding Portal
text: [REACTION]: After you win a command struggle, exhaust this support to move a target Kabalite army unit you control at that planet to a [Material] planet (red). That unit gains 1 command icon until the end of the phase.

name: Hallucinogen Grenade
text:
Attach to a Kabalite army unit you control.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Sacrifice this attachment to exhaust a target enemy non-Elite army unit at this planet. Then, deal damage to that unit equal to its printed ATK value.

name: Kroot Hunter
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit at a [Material] planet (red), gain 1 [RESOURCE].
flavor: The Kroot sell their services as mercenaries to the Tau Empire, allowing them to collect genetic material from across the galaxy.

name: War of Ideas
text: [INTERRUPT]: When a command struggle resolves at a planet, exhausted army units you control count their command icons during that command struggle.

name: Genestealer Harvesters
text: [REACTION]: While this unit is at an infested planet, it gains: +1 card and +1 [RESOURCE] when command struggle won at this planet.

name: Nesting Chamber
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to infest a planet with 2 or more Genestealer units at it.
flavor: A sickening lair from which the tide of infestation flows.

name: Ymgarl Factor
text:
Attach to an army unit you control.
[ACTION]: Pay 1 [RESOURCE] to have attached unit get, until the end of the phase, either: +2 ATK or +2 HP.
